articles.title: Judge allows E. Jean Carroll to amend her defamation lawsuit to seek more damages against Trump | CNN Politics
articles.description: A federal judge will allow E. Jean Carroll to amend her original defamation lawsuit against former President Donald Trump to include comments he made at a CNN town hall.
articles.content:
